operations.description: Gets the available metrics for the IotHub service
operations.name: Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs/metricDefinitions/read

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of device-to-cloud telemetry messages attempted to be sent to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.ingress.allProtocol

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of device-to-cloud telemetry messages sent successfully to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.ingress.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of cloud-to-device message deliveries completed successfully by the device
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.commands.egress.complete.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of cloud-to-device messages abandoned by the device
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.commands.egress.abandon.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of cloud-to-device messages rejected by the device
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.commands.egress.reject.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of expired cloud-to-device messages
metricSpecifications.name: C2DMessagesExpired

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of devices registered to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: devices.totalDevices

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of devices connected to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: devices.connectedDevices.allProtocol

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times messages were successfully delivered to all endpoints using IoT Hub routing. If a message is routed to multiple endpoints, this value increases by one for each successful delivery. If a message is delivered to the same endpoint multiple times, this value increases by one for each successful delivery.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.egress.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times messages were dropped by IoT Hub routing due to dead endpoints. This value does not count messages delivered to fallback route as dropped messages are not delivered there.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.egress.dropped

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times messages were orphaned by IoT Hub routing because they didn't match any routing rules (including the fallback rule).
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.egress.orphaned

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing failed to deliver messages due to an incompatibility with the endpoint. This value does not include retries.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.egress.invalid

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing delivered messages to the endpoint associated with the fallback route.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.egress.fallback

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing successfully delivered messages to Event Hub endpoints.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: messages delivered to Event Hub
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.eventHubs

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and message ingress into an Event Hub endpoint.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: message latency for Event Hub
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.latency.eventHubs

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing successfully delivered messages to Service Bus queue endpoints.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: messages delivered to Service Bus Queue
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.serviceBusQueues

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and telemetry message ingress into a Service Bus queue endpoint.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: message latency for Service Bus Queue
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.latency.serviceBusQueues

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing successfully delivered messages to Service Bus topic endpoints.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: messages delivered to Service Bus Topic
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.serviceBusTopics

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and telemetry message ingress into a Service Bus topic endpoint.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing: message latency for Service Bus Topic
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.latency.serviceBusTopics

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing successfully delivered messages to the built-in endpoint (messages/events).
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.builtIn.events

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and telemetry message ingress into the built-in endpoint (messages/events).
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.latency.builtIn.events

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing successfully delivered messages to storage endpoints.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.storage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and telemetry message ingress into a storage endpoint.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.latency.storage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of data (bytes) IoT Hub routing delivered to storage endpoints.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.storage.bytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub routing delivered blobs to storage endpoints.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.endpoints.egress.storage.blobs

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of IoT Hub events published to Event Grid. Use the Result dimension for the number of successful and failed requests. EventType dimension shows the type of event (https://aka.ms/ioteventgrid).
metricSpecifications.name: EventGridDeliveries

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) from when the Iot Hub event was generated to when the event was published to Event Grid. This number is an average between all event types. Use the EventType dimension to see latency of a specific type of event.
metricSpecifications.name: EventGridLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of times IoT Hub attempted to deliver messages to all endpoints using routing. To see the number of successful or failed attempts, use the Result dimension. To see the reason of failure, like invalid, dropped, or orphaned, use the FailureReasonCategory dimension. You can also use the EndpointName and EndpointType dimensions to understand how many messages were delivered to your different endpoints. The metric value increases by one for each delivery attempt, including if the message is delivered to multiple endpoints or if the message is delivered to the same endpoint multiple times.
metricSpecifications.name: RoutingDeliveries

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average latency (milliseconds) between message ingress to IoT Hub and telemetry message ingress into an endpoint. You can use the EndpointName and EndpointType dimensions to understand the latency to your different endpoints.
metricSpecifications.name: RoutingDeliveryLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total size in bytes of messages delivered by IoT hub to an endpoint. You can use the EndpointName and EndpointType dimensions to view the size of the messages in bytes delivered to your different endpoints. The metric value increases for every message delivered, including if the message is delivered to multiple endpoints or if the message is delivered to the same endpoint multiple times.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Routing Delivery Message Size in Bytes (preview)
metricSpecifications.name: RoutingDataSizeInBytesDelivered

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful device-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.read.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed device-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.read.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max of all successful device-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Response size of twin reads from devices
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.read.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful device-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.update.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed device-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.update.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max size of all successful device-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Size of twin updates from devices
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.twin.update.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful direct method calls.
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.methods.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed direct method calls.
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.methods.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max of all successful direct method requests.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Request size of direct method invocations
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.methods.requestSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max of all successful direct method responses.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Response size of direct method invocations
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.methods.responseSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful back-end-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Successful twin reads from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.read.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed back-end-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Failed twin reads from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.read.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max of all successful back-end-initiated twin reads.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Response size of twin reads from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.read.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful back-end-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Successful twin updates from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.update.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed back-end-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Failed twin updates from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.update.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max size of all successful back-end-initiated twin updates.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Size of twin updates from back end
metricSpecifications.name: c2d.twin.update.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful twin queries.
metricSpecifications.name: twinQueries.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed twin queries.
metricSpecifications.name: twinQueries.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average, min, and max of the result size of all successful twin queries.
metricSpecifications.name: twinQueries.resultSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful creation of twin update jobs.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Successful creations of twin update jobs
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.createTwinUpdateJob.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed creation of twin update jobs.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Failed creations of twin update jobs
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.createTwinUpdateJob.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful creation of direct method invocation jobs.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Successful creations of method invocation jobs
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.createDirectMethodJob.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed creation of direct method invocation jobs.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Failed creations of method invocation jobs
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.createDirectMethodJob.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful calls to list jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.listJobs.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed calls to list jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.listJobs.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful calls to cancel a job.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.cancelJob.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed calls to cancel a job.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.cancelJob.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful calls to query jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.queryJobs.success

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed calls to query jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.queryJobs.failure

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all completed jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.completed

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all failed jobs.
metricSpecifications.name: jobs.failed

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of throttling errors due to device throughput throttles
metricSpecifications.name: d2c.telemetry.ingress.sendThrottle

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of total messages used today
metricSpecifications.name: dailyMessageQuotaUsed

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Bytes transferred to and from any devices connected to IotHub
metricSpecifications.name: deviceDataUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Bytes transferred to and from any devices connected to IotHub
metricSpecifications.name: deviceDataUsageV2

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of devices registered to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: totalDeviceCount

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of devices connected to your IoT hub
metricSpecifications.name: connectedDeviceCount

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Metrics for Configuration Operations
metricSpecifications.name: configurations

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total number of messages published to the broker
metricSpecifications.name: broker.msgs.published

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total number of messages delivered by the broker
metricSpecifications.name: broker.msgs.delivered

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The average egress message delivery latency due to throttling
metricSpecifications.displayName: Broker: Message delivery latency from throttling (Preview)
metricSpecifications.name: broker.msgs.delivery.throttlingLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The number of new connections per IoT Hub
metricSpecifications.name: mqtt.connections

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The rate of dropped sessions per IoT Hub
metricSpecifications.name: mqtt.sessions.dropped

metricSpecifications.name: mqtt.subscriptions

metricSpecifications.name: mqtt.sessions
